title: 3 BD Apartment For Sale in Havelock City - New Tower
details:
Ideal investment in Sri Lanka's best condominium complex!

The apartment is located on a mid level floor with breathtaking views of the Garden and Swimming Pool. The Apartment has 3 Bedrooms & 2 Bathrooms (1 attached and 1 common). Plus this has a room for the maids and a bathroom as well. And the apartment is very spacious as it has a floor area of 1500 square feet.

[After purchase, if you decide to give this on rent, you can have a rental of 1700 -1850 USD per month (guaranteed)]

Plus, The Havelock City premises include many facilities such as a magnificent swimming pool & gymnasium, Cafeteria, Also the entire premises is offered with 24/7 security.
